title: Bug 120315 - Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Verify that the item is still being displayed instead of being hidden.
